metadata.description: It's DEADPOOL versus SHANG-CHI, the peerless Master of Kung Fu, in a KUNG FU MOTORCYCLE RACE! You won't believe your eyes when you read this all-action, all-black-and-white one shot in the spirit of the Mighty Marvel Magazines of yore, but ALL-NOW in style! The kung fu fighting never lets up for a moment over these four stories by some of Marvel's hottest writers!
metadata.name: Shang-Chi: Master of Kung Fu
